ann-safety.title: Safety Announcement
ann-safety.description: The TTC takes your safety very seriously. In the event of an emergency, speak to a staff member. Use the emergency alarm on board a train, or DWA button or the payphone on the platform. You can also report concerns using the SafeTTC app.

doors-closing-rocket.title: Doors Closing
doors-closing-rocket.description: Please stand clear of the doors.
